name: product-ontime-analysis
description: Root npm helpers for local (Docker-free) development of the product-ontime-analysis repo.

scripts.dev:astro: bash -lc "cd astro-sample && npm install && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:hf: bash -lc "cd hf-space-inventory-sqlgen && python3 -m venv .venv || true && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python app.py"
scripts.setup:python: npm run venv:create && npm run venv:install
scripts.setup: npm run setup:node && npm run setup:python
scripts.test:api: bash -lc 'if [ -f test_api.py ]; then python3 test_api.py; else echo "test_api.py not found"; fi'
scripts.hf-space:test: bash -lc 'cd hf-space-inventory-sqlgen && if [ -f test_mcp.py ]; then python3 test_mcp.py; else echo "no hf-space tests found"; fi'
